      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(User newUser)
                throws exceptions.RepeatedUsernameException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Adds an user to the BST and returns true in case it was added
        Parameters:
        newUser - User
        Returns:
        true in case the user was added, any otherwise it throws an exception
        Throws:
        exceptions.RepeatedUsernameException - in case the name of the user to be added is already in use by other user in the BST

        public void createPost(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String content,
                       java.lang.String categoryName,
                       User author,
                       java.lang.String link)
                throws exceptions.EmptyFieldsException
        Creates a post and add it to the list of posts of vistara, the author and the followers of the author
        Parameters:
        title, - String, the title of the post. It must be different from null and an empty string
        content, - String, the content of the post. It must be different from null and an empty string
        categoryName, - String, name of the category. It must be different from null and an empty string
        author, - User, the user that is creating the post
        link - String link to the whole new
        Throws:
        exceptions.EmptyFieldsException - in case any of the parameters is an empty string

                          Post post)

        content, - String, the content of the comment. It must be different from null and an empty string
        post, - Post, the post to be commented. It must be different from null.

      • searchPost

        public Post searchPost(java.lang.String title)
                throws exceptions.EmptyFieldsException
        Search a posts according to the title. This method implements binary search cause the list is sorted
        Parameters:
        title, - String, the title of the posts to search. It must be different from null and an empty string
        Returns:
        the searched post or null in case the post does not exist
        Throws:
        exceptions.EmptyFieldsException - in case the title is an empty string
